# nodeTime(forPlayerTime:)

**Instance Method**

Converts from player time to node time.

## Declaration

```swift
func nodeTime(forPlayerTime playerTime: AVAudioTime) -> AVAudioTime?
```

## Parameters

- **playerTime**: A time relative to the player’s start time.

## Return Value

A node time, or `nil` if the player isn’t playing.

## Discussion

For more information about this method and its inverse [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioPlayerNode/playerTime(forNodeTime:)], see [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioPlayerNode#Player-Timeline].

## Converting Node and Player Times

- **playerTime(forNodeTime:)**: Converts from node time to player time.
